website_summaries.verdict: Hemp oil in capsule form makes it easier to ingest, and added omega 3-6-9 provides nutritional aid.
pros: Completely vegan, does not contain carrageenan
90 capsule bottle will last for 45 days at 2 capsules per day
Formulation digests well and does not appear to cause stomach problems
cons: Sometimes the number of capsules vary – not the 90 advertised on the label
This oil does not relieve pain like CBD oils

customer_reviews.title: Initially I was bummed because I thought these capsules did ...
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was bummed because I thought these capsules did nothing, but because I had a whole bottle full I decided to give them another try. On this try I took two capsules instead of just one. That night I slept 7 hours straight, definitely not my norm. The next night I slept almost 8 hours and the third night I slept 7 and a half. A large part of why I'm sleeping so well is that my arthritis pain is controlled enough so that it is not waking me in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think it works!
customer_reviews.text: I wish it contained cbd, but then it would be super expensive I’m sure. Anyway, my hair and skin are always soft and I get compliments regularly, my theory is that it is due to this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: bananabread

customer_reviews.title: I really like these hemp oil capsules
customer_reviews.text: I really like these hemp oil capsules. It has helped a lot with my inflammation in my back and arms. I'm am moving around so much better. Could tell a difference after a couple of days of taking recommended dose every evening. Will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing, But Not Good for Those with a Nut Allergy/Sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: It did make me a bit more relaxed, but I didn’t sleep better like so many people have claimed. Also, I ended up having a mild allergic reaction after taking it a couple of times. Steer clear of this product if you have any allergies or sensitivities to nuts or seeds becaue it might make you itchy and cause stomach issues like it did to me. I looked into this afterwards and discovered that many people with these allergies/sensitivities don’t react well to hemp oil products.
customer_reviews.author: Horror_Lover

customer_reviews.title: The best hemp pills on the market!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm ordering my third bottle. It helps me sleep. I have the worst insomnia ever and until I found this product I was sleepless. I take two and before I know it... I'm out like a light and sleep like a baby! No side effects and very reasonably priced. I ordered a different brand from the health store spent $25 and nothing... I will continue this brand because I love it & I can afford it!!!
customer_reviews.author: LonCapone

customer_reviews.title: great find!
customer_reviews.text: Glad I found something that works. Definately helps me to not have such dry skin. So far this product does exactly what I needed and expected. Delivered quick. I would surely recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: chasing the cat and the mailman like he did when he was a puppy
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 9 year old dog who started having pain. He's running around again, chasing the cat and the mailman like he did when he was a puppy.
customer_reviews.author: NOLA FOREVER

customer_reviews.title: May cause mild laxative effect at full recommended dosing. First time user should be careful for ...
customer_reviews.text: Fair value. Funky after taste. May cause mild laxative effect at full recommended dosing. First time user should be careful for first few days as it may cause dizziness. Good for sleep. Fair help for easing symptoms of discontinuing long time prescription opiate pain medicine use.

customer_reviews.title: Effectiveness and price
customer_reviews.text: This is the best CBD capsule I’ve found. Works better for me than sublingual drops and has no aftertaste. I love the price. I’ve paid 10 times as much for oil that works no better than these capsules.

My dad is take a note for his arthritis and swelling and it has helped greatly. My husband is taking it to increase appetite since he doesn't eat as much as he should and his blood sugar drops. And he is slowly but surely gaining weight and even eating more. I am thoroughly impressed.

customer_reviews.title: Bottle was tampered with
customer_reviews.text: Ordered several bottles, opened one today and after I removed the plastic ring around the lid I discovered the reflective seal underneath was not only broken but more than half of the capsules were missing. 42 in the bottle instead of 90. I of course can not consume these now because they've been tampered with and unfortunately I buy several bottles at a time so I don't think I can recoup my loss since my purchase was made several month ago.

I take hemp oil for chronic back pain. The Manitoba Harvest hemp oil I normally take works very well for this. Unfortunately this product did not. I will not buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the skin and overall health

I bought a bottle of hemp oil, but couldn't stand the taste of it, so I bought these capsules instead and it makes it much easier to take it. I feel like it does help my complexion. I take this and probiotics daily as part of my skincare regimen and just overall good health.

I do also feel a bit better mentally.

customer_reviews.text: I have not gotten any pain relief from this product, but it really helps for anxiety. However, make sure you eat something before you take it. It gave me quite the stomach ache, as well as nausea. The reviewer that said it gives a laxative effect was correct. It does seem to slow my heart rate during times of stress. I don't think it is strong enough to use for sleep, although I have not tried it for that. I recommend for anxiety, but not for pain. I will repurchase, though.
customer_reviews.author: teader

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to take with little to no aftertaste at all. Also seemed to really help get rid of some lower back pain I have been having the same day I started taking it; which was a total bonus as I wasn't expecting that! I have had some arthritic pain in my ankle and knee for a couple years which has also gone since I have started to use this product. I purchased this for the benefits of Omegas 3, 6 and 9, but have been enjoying the effects of everything else it seems to help with. Consider me a believer, I will continue to purchase this item!

customer_reviews.title: love this I have been taking this in combination with ...

I plan to keep this routine up and see if it will continue to help or if I am at the level that it will..

customer_reviews.text: Started taking this late March. Just 1 per day. Last January 13 my triglycerides were 116. On August 26, they were down to 89. I have not changed my diet. Can't say these capsules did it, but can't explain it otherwise. Going to order more.

I opened one to taste the oil and it didn't have the light nutty flavor I expect in a quality product. Normally I buy unfiltered cold pressed oil but since I was travelling a lot the pills seemed more convenient. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Oosten

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Lowered triglyceride levels
customer_reviews.text: I've had high triglyceride levels for years (Over 500) due to well, bad genes and yeah, I love chocolate. My Dr insisted I have to take fish oil, but as a vegetarian I simply didn't want to do that. I decided, against his advice to try this. After taking 3 pills for a week, my levels dropped to an astounding 147. Even on my best blood work the lowest I have ever had before was in the low 300s. Not sure if this will work for everyone, but it did for me!
customer_reviews.author: FenwayWhalers

customer_reviews.title: Good value and sensible packaging...

Real CBD oil is much more expensive, a lot more. I pay about $70 for 60 capsules. I still take this supplement too though and I feel like it's a good quality for the price, but it has NO CBD oil in it. Do a lot of research before you buy CBD products. I didn't at first so now I have an extra supplement. Oh well.

customer_reviews.author: William Chambliss

customer_reviews.title: Don't you know it's good for ya
customer_reviews.text: Whatsa matter with you if you no take the hemp oil? Don't you know it's good for ya?? This is the vegan kind so it shouldn't have any hemp animals in it. You really should be taking hemp oil as a daily supplement. Lots of benefits to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jae Sea

product_meta.title: Deva Nutrition Vegan Hemp Oil Capsules, 90 Count
product_meta.description: Hemp oil or hemp seed oil is a popular oil commonly used in dietary supplements, cosmetics and culinary applications. Basic research suggests that hemp seed oil gets its health benefits from its high fatty acid concentration, antioxidants, vitamins and phytosterols.
feature_bullets: Fatty acids alpha linoleic acid (omega-3), linoleic acid (omega-6) and oleic acid (omega-9) carry much of the health benefits in hemp seed oil
Pleasant nutty smell and, a deep green color
